snippet: Mr. Hot Stuff, who ran in the 2009 Kentucky Derby and Belmont Stakes but had only one win in flat racing, is rising through the steeplechase ranks.
abstract: Mr. Hot Stuff, who ran in the 2009 Kentucky Derby and Belmont Stakes but had only one win in flat racing, is rising through the steeplechase ranks.

headline.main: Mr. Hot Stuff's Career Switch Pays Off Handsomely
